title: DNI chief Gabbard: UK agrres to drop 'backdoor' mandate for Apple
description: WASHINGTON, D.C. — US Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard said on Monday the United Kingdom had agreed to drop its mandate for iPhone maker Apple to provide a “backdoor” that would have enabled access to the protected encrypted data of American citizens.

title: 57-year-old woman thought stress was causing headaches - Apple watch warnings led to brain tumour diagnosis
description: After stress, anxiety, and minor injuries, Sam Adams’ Apple Watch detected low heart rates, leading to a cardiac ectopy and a brain tumour diagnosis, highlighting the importance of early symptom monitoring.
